it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTable
            • it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.event.RowSorterListener, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class Table
extends javax.swing.JTable
    CLASS FOR INSTANTIATING AND MANAGING DATA TABLES
    - Recommended instantiation in addPanelFrameComponents method
    - Adding tableContainer to frameComponents collection
    - Supports customization at instantiation stage
    - Access to TableModel component for advanced management
    Version:
    1.0.0.2
    Author:
    GD Applicazioni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Table

        public Table(java.lang.String[] columnItems,
             int[] columnWidths,
             int[] columnsAlignment,
             int rowsNumber,
             boolean isEditable,
             int selectionMode,
             int headerHeight,
             int headerAlignment,
             java.awt.Color headerBackground,
             java.awt.Color headerForeground,
             int rowHeight,
             java.awt.Color tableBackground,
             java.awt.Color tableForeground,
             java.lang.String fontType,
             int fontStyle,
             int fontSize,
             int posX,
             int posY,
             int tableWidth,
             int tableHeight)
        CONSTRUCTOR FOR FULL OBJECT INSTANTIATION
        Parameters:
        columnItems - Array of strings for column items
        columnWidths - Array of int for column widths
        columnsAlignment - Array of int for text column alignments (see BasicInterface)
        rowsNumber - Number of initial rows at table instantiation
        isEditable - Table editability setting
        selectionMode - Record selection mode setting (see BasicInterface)
        headerHeight - Header table height
        headerAlignment - Header Cell Text Alignment
        headerBackground - Header background color
        headerForeground - Header text color
        rowHeight - Table rows height
        tableBackground - Table background color
        tableForeground - Text color table
        fontType - Table font type (see BasicInterface)
        fontStyle - Table font style (see BasicInterface)
        fontSize - Table font size
        posX - X-axis object position
        posY - Y-axis object position
        tableWidth - The object width
        tableHeight - The object height
